STEP 1: APPLY FIXES (5 minutes)

  - Add missing author, repository, and files fields
  - See: PUBLICATION_FIXES_CHECKLIST.md

STEP 2: VALIDATE LOCALLY (5 minutes)
  - Run: npm audit
  - Run: npm run build
  - Run: npm run test
  - Verify: All packages compile and tests pass

STEP 3: COMMIT TO GIT (2 minutes)
  - Stage changes: git add -A
  - Commit: git commit -m "fix: Add missing package.json fields for npm"
  - Push: git push origin main

STEP 4: SETUP NPM CREDENTIALS (3 minutes)
  - npm login
  - Enter npm credentials
  - 2FA if enabled

STEP 5: PUBLISH TO NPM (5 minutes)
  - cd neural-trader-rust/packages
  - npm publish --workspaces --access public
  - Wait for all 21 packages to publish

STEP 6: VERIFY PUBLICATION (3 minutes)
  - npm view @neural-trader/core versions
  - npm view @neural-trader/neural versions
  - Visit https://npmjs.com/org/neural-trader
  - Install test: npm install @neural-trader/core
